reference.shortdesc: The booklibrary element contains the library information for a book.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Library entries contain information about the series, library, or collection of documents to which the book belongs.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The booklibrary element is specialized from ph; it is defined in the bookmap module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and keyref.
